original_title: A Dream of Becoming 24 Eyes, 4 Parallel Brains and 360° Vision
overview: A dream of becoming twenty four eyes four parallel brains and three hundred and sixty degree vision comments on abstract thoughts which relate to consciousness, transgender experience, movement and space perception. The film is a compilation of fragments and citations of Doireann O’Malley’s personal archive, comprising moments and experiences that float on a mirage of time.
title: A Dream of Becoming 24 Eyes, 4 Parallel Brains and 360° Vision
